ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Armor
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a magic necklace that is a good item for low to mid level bards that is fairly easy to acquire solo.  Its called the Order of Thunder (no drop) and is
ygData.messageBody:
There is a magic necklace that is a good item for low to mid level bards
that is fairly easy to acquire solo. Its called the Order of Thunder (no
drop) and is found off a named zombie in the Qeynos aqueducts. Its been a
while since I wore it (got a Cape of the Midnight Mist now) but IIRC one of
the bonuses is +5 charisma. It also has a small AC boost as well as
function as a light source. Check out a spoiler site if you want to know
all the stats on it.

Galtin of E'ci


-----Original Message-----
From: Rains, Darryl [mailto:dsrains@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 10:10 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Armor


I must say I have a great guild. I researched every piece of armor, saved my
PP's and coordinated guild nights where we quested for these items. They
were more than happy to assist me in these efforts.

My current items are:
Ears 2 x +3 Str ? I cant remember what they are called.
Fingers 2 x Jagged Bands
Neck Spiked Collar
Shoulders Blood Stained Mantle
Waist Troll Hide Belt
Back Banded Cloak

Skarsol Andantino
27th bard
Cazic Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 13, 2000 2:43 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Lambent Armor

WOW! You completed the Lambent at 27th congrats! I still only have 4
pieces at 30th.
Here's what I have, but I'm a weak little wood elf so I needed the Str.

Ears: 2 x Gold Topaz Earrings AC:3, +8 vs Disease
Fingers: 2 x Jagged Bands AC:5, +3 Str
Neck: Gold Pearl Choker AC:5, +13 vs Poison (I think
that's right)
Shoulders: Crested Spaulders AC:11, +5 Stamina
Waist: Thick Leather Apron AC:8 (Sigh, still have this after 15
levels)
Back: Sleek Black Cape AC:6 (Ok, it still sucks
after 15 levels)

Kitasi Faegehearper 30th on E'ci

I finally completed my Lambent armor last night. (Yea me!) Now, my question
is what should I get for my other armor slots. I am 27th level so I am
looking for items I can get. What should I have in my earrings, rings, neck,
shoulders, back and waist slots?

Skarsol Andantino
27th Bard
Cazic Thule
